model

Class TopWindowModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.AbstractModel
      • model.TopWindowModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Model

    public class TopWindowModel
extends AbstractModel
    Author:
    Trevor Underwood Will use synchronization so threads don't get in each other's way. Used for controlling the deposit and withdraw, as well as creating those windows. Implements methods for the deposit and withdraw windows.
